mapper.select: SELECT board_id as boardId, subject, view_cnt as viewCnt, writer, write_date as writeDate, mod_date as modDate FROM board ORDER BY boardId DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{length};
SELECT count('x') as CNT FROM board;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(subject, content, view_cnt, writer, write_date, mod_date) VALUES (#{subject}, #{content}, 0, #{writer}, NOW(), NOW());
